extendedInfo.description: Search our catalog for books, DVDs, audiobooks, CDs, and more. With mobile search, you can enter a few letters of each word and get instant results (e.g., to find Mark Twain, type âma twaâ).BookCheck Mobile Checkout saves you time at the library. When you find an item you want, scan the barcode with your mobile device. The correct barcode is on a label that says âChampaign Public Library,â on the itemâs cover. (Note: A rental fee is charged when you scan a rental item.) Make a quick stop at our Mobile Checkout station to complete your checkout.Downloadable eBooks and audiobooks are available through My Media Mall. To use them, youâll need free software or a free app. Contact the library or visit champaign.org/downloadables for details.Use BookLook when youâre out shopping for books. Scan the ISBN barcode on any book, and BookLook will tell you if itâs available from the library.You can also: use your library account to check due dates and request items; see our calendar of free events; and contact us with your questions.

reviews.title: Super convenient...except...
reviews.comment: This little app is super convenient. I love the barcode scan, easy renewal system, and digital library. However, it would be way easier to login with my login name instead of the barcode. It\'s not very convenient to have to fish for my library card when I want to use the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Blissful convenience
reviews.comment: Once again, the Champaign Public Library is a step ahead. This app brings library business to the smartphone era with effortless catalog searches, request control, and renewal and inventory of checked out items. It even can keep you up to date with library events and reccomendations. The library has given me another reason to love them, and the ability to do it anywhere with a signal. I\'m addicted to my phone and will definitely handle all my library business like this from now on.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Says file system invalid. Another not quite ready for prime time technology from Champaign public library.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work.
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t work.  It is hard to find books by title, then you can\'t request them.  Now I find I can\'t even renew books through it!  My browser works better.
reviews.author: A Google User
